RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 13, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEH SCHNELL stalked the pace four wide into the far turn, rallied three wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch, was headed inside the sixteenth pole then dug in determinedly under strong handling in the final yards and proved best by the narrowest of margins. LUCKY ANDY trailed along the inside into the stretch, shifted out four wide, rallied to make the lead in deep stretch and just failed. EXALTED JOY pressed the pace two wide into the far turn, dropped back and shifted out five wide entering the stretch then came on again lat. DEER CREEK ROAD stalked the early pace three wide, offered a mild bid before a half, kept pressure into the stretch and weakened late. ONLYATTHESHOE away alertly, set the pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Exalted Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, dropped back 2turn, shifted 5w, came again

ENTRY.NAME: Onlyattheshoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Creek Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Andy
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed inside, rallied 4 wide, led late, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: Geh Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4w, rallied 3w, took over top stretch, headed late,gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 13. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OAKEN allowed to settle, closed willingly five then four wide through the stretch to make the lead late and drew off. KARAMEL CORN close up while settling in the four path, had a mild late rally three wide and finished second best. TIZ A RUSH trailed for a half then finished with good courage along the rail. CRAZYCANTBERIGHTED sprinted up the inside to make the lead soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch then weakened. BUCKEYE RUCKUS had a brief early lead, pressed the lead two wide until mid turn then weakened. OLE WATASHI offered a mild bid two wide midway on the turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Crazycantberighted
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace late stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz a Rush
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed half, finished well rail

ENTRY.NAME: Ole Watashi
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead, pressed 2 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Oaken
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed willingly, 5-4wide, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Karamel Corn
ENTRY.OWNER: Fulwiler Heather Fulwiler Richard Tieman Diane M and Hutson Bernard
ENTRY.COMMENT: close 4path, mild rally, 4-3wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 22400. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIGER TRAIL pressed the pace two wide for three furlongs, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and lasted under strong handling. SHOW SLIDING HOME trailed into the stretch, closed willingly in the two path and just missed. BABA LOOEY vied for the lead three then four wide and finished determinedly. PRIMITIVO stalked the pace four then five wide and went evenly. YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE raced outside and lacked the needed response. NEBULOSA was hustled to the front soon after the start, set the pace under pressure for three furlongs then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Nebulosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, set pressured pace top lane, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Show Sliding Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly 2path, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wide, 3/16pole lead, all out, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Baba Looey
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3-4wide, finished determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Primitivo
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Boy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6 wide trip, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 13. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,0 00 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).

CLAIM.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC

RACE.FOOTNOTES: IT'S FATE allowed to settle, closed willingly five wide through the stretch under right handed urging and was along in time. SUDDEN SHIFT settled inside down the backstretch, moved closer on the far turn, shifted out to the four path, dug in late and finished clear for second. SAY HEY KID unhurried early, found his best stride late in the five path. PAT DADDY never far back, responded with a rapid move two wide through the far turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch, maintained control until deep stretch then was outfinished. DEBDURITE vied for the lead three wide into the stretch then faded. SKIDSTREAM pressed the pace two wide around the first turn, made the lead, dropped inside, set the pace to the top of the stretch and weakened in the final furlong. TUFF ATTACK set the early pace along the inside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, quick move 2nd turn, led late, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Say Hey Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late 5path

ENTRY.NAME: It's Fate
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, closed willingly, 5 wide, right handed urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Skidstream
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, led, set pace top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Debdurite
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sudden Shift
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, angled out 4path top lane, rallied, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FUNNY MAN forwardly place from start, stalked the pace three wide under a firm hold, advanced steadily through the far turn to make the lead in upper stretch then widened the balance of the trip to win going away. C C'S CLEAR CREEK away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the far turn, dropped back a bit, shifted out to the four path, dug in gamely and gained second. SHORTLY prompted the pace two wide into the far turn, made the lead briefly then was outfinished. STREET MAX failed to menace. DONAHUE was no factor. TWELVE MINUS ONE with the second flight inside, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Funny Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Pelfrey Ruth Nicoletta Gerald Tait Bob Hertrich III Frederick and Blazing Meadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, steady advance, 3 wide, full of run, going away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich III & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Street Max
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Minus One
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Donahue
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Clear Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside 2nd turn, dug in late,gained second

ENTRY.NAME: Shortly
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, led far turn, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1 1/2M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A R ace Since August 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY BROTHER CAM trailed into the final turn, circled rivals three wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while being ridden out. SHELL FIRE allowed to settle, rallied three wide into the final turn to make the lead, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner. ROYAL DRAGOON unhurried early, loomed boldly two wide into the final turn, matched stride into the stretch then was outfinished. BOURBON WISDOM pressed the pace two wide for a half, made the lead, quickly opened a daylight advantage entering the backstretch, set the pace into the final turn, remained closed into the stretch then gave way late. ITASCA set the pace along the inside for four and one half furlongs, chased the leader into the final turn then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: My Brother Cam
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled 3 wide final turn, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Dragoon
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, loomed boldly 2 wide, 3/8 pole, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Wisdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, took over 15/16pole, drew clear, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Shell Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rallied 3 wide final turn, set pace top lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Itasca
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, gave way final turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIBERTY BELLE pressed the pace two wide into the turn, gained a narrow lead nearing the quarter pole, was headed by the runner up in upper stretch then fought back gamely under left handed urging to get back up in time. JEN'S BATTLE trailed down the backstretch, circled rivals rapidly three wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch then finished second best. MAMBO DANCER pressed the early pace two wide, dropped back on the turn then finished evenly. CEVICHE was a sharp threat three wide and weakened on the turn. PROSPECTIVE FORUM was hustled to the lead, soon after the start, set a pressured pace along the inside for nearly a half then gave way late. TURBIE was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Prospective Forum
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled lead, set pace inside, 1/4 pole, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Mambo Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, dropped back turn, even finish 2wide

ENTRY.NAME: Jen's Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed fast, 3 wide, led, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Turbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Ceviche
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, led, headed, fought back gamely,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OHIO EAGLE trailed down the backstretch, circled his field through the stretch under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. CONDEMNATION stalked the early pace, rallied three wide to make the lead in upper stretch, set the balance of the pace and was caught in the final stages while under strong right handed urging. WILDCAT BILL was antsy in the gate, vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch, shifted three wide for racing room and finished with good courage. STUNT MAN had a mild rally late in the six path. WORTHY OPPONENT away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. KEEPING SCORE offered a mild bid four wide into the stretch then came up empty. CLASSIC MO pressed the pace three then two wide and weakened in the stretch. EL MARRO was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Bill
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate, tracked inside, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: El Marro
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, left handed urging, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Stunt Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally late 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Worthy Opponent
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Condemnation
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, rallied 3 wide, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Keeping Score
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 13 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CYCLONE stalked the pace four wide into the far turn, rallied two wide to engage the leader entering the stretch, battled the balance of the trip and proved best under right handed urging. GOODBYELLOWBRICKRD set the pace along the inside into the stretch, dug in gamely when headed by the winner but finished second best. R CARDINAL PRINCE trailed early, split horses with a rapid move three wide before a half, remained a sharp threat into the stretch and was outfinished. CITY OF CLOUDS pressed the pace three then two wide and finished evenly. CENTSOFWANDER was no factor. FALK was through after a half. HURRY ON OUT vied for the lead along the inside for six furlongs then folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Hurry On Out
ENTRY.OWNER: Batchelder Stephen H and Jack Ventures LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside 6furslongs, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Goodbyellowbrickrd
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, dug in gamely, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: R Cardinal Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, quick move 3w, backstretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Falk
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: City of Clouds
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Cyclone
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4w, rallied 2 wide 2nd turn, long drive, all out,
